summary: Digital art academy platform for Rabindra Bharati Art Academy with admission system, student/teacher dashboards, exam level progression, homework assignments, live classes, and gallery management
architectural_notes: Multi-role system (Student, Teacher) with role-based access control
Cloud-based MongoDB database for all data persistence
Live streaming infrastructure for embedded classroom functionality
Image upload and storage for artwork samples and teaching references
Level-based content filtering ensuring students only see relevant materials
Exam progression tracking through 13 distinct levels (Adhya through 8th Year)
Teacher approval workflow for admissions and student promotions
Mobile-first responsive design for child-friendly interface
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Artistic, colorful academy logo with paintbrush and palette motifs suitable for children (academy-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Warm, inviting hero banner image showing children painting in an art classroom (hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png)
- Friendly illustration of art supplies including paintbrushes, palettes, and canvases (art-supplies-illustration.dim_800x600.png)
- Gallery placeholder image showing an empty easel waiting for artwork (gallery-placeholder.dim_400x300.png)
- Student dashboard welcome illustration with colorful art elements (dashboard-welcome.dim_600x400.png)
- Teacher panel header illustration showing instructor with students (teacher-panel-header.dim_800x300.png)
